title: Inside the Parker - Yankees Coming! Steve Cohen Twitter Clown Show, Betting on the Bases, Guest: Pirates SS Kevin Newman
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Yankees Coming! Steve Cohen Twitter Clown Show, Betting on the Bases, Guest: Pirates SS Kevin Newman
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob gives his take on the surging Yankees in the AL East, Hall of Fame pitcher Jack Morris' suspension for racist comments about Shohei Ohtani, and why Mets Owner Steve Cohen making a fool of himself by mean Tweeting through his team's hitting woes. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair, Betting on the Bases.

Guests: Pirates SS Kevin Newman discusses the recent accomplishment he shares with Honus Wagner, and how he stays focused despite Pittsburgh being out of playoff contention.

Mariners Play-By-Play Announcer Dave Sims explains why the Mariners are in playoff contention, and shares his thoughts on the Field of Dreams game.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
